definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The form of the former formula is formally formulated.
sentences.chinese: 前一个分子式的形式得到正式表述。

sentences.english: The form. of the former formula is formally formulated.
sentences.chinese: 前一个分子式的情势得到正式表述。

sentences.english: The molecular formula shows nothing but the total member of carbon and hydrogen atoms.
sentences.chinese: 分子式只不过表示碳和氢原子各自的总和。

sentences.english: The form of the former formula is formally formulated .
sentences.chinese: 前一个分子式的形式得到正式的表述。

sentences.english: From the molecular formula alone, we can deduce the "degrees of unsaturation " in the molecule.
sentences.chinese: 仅从分子式，我们就能推断分子中的“不饱和度”。

sentences.english: The chemical formula for water is H2O.
We learned chemical formulas at school but I can only remember H2O for water.
sentences.chinese: 我们上学时学过化学分子式，但我只记得水是H2O。

definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
